title: Vangibath (Karnataka Style Eggplant Rice)
instructions: Heat oil in a pan, add mustard seeds and let them splutter.
Add urad dal, chana dal, and dried red chilies.
Sauté until dals turn golden brown.
Add curry leaves and chopped brinjals.
Cook brinjals until tender, add vangibath powder and salt.
Add cooked rice and mix gently until well combined.
Cook for 2-3 minutes on low heat. Serve hot.

title: Ragi Mudde (Finger Millet Balls)
instructions: Boil water in a large pot.
Gradually add ragi flour while stirring continuously.
Keep stirring to avoid lumps until thick consistency.
Cover and cook on low heat for 10 minutes.
Wet hands and shape into round balls.
Serve hot with sambar or curry.

title: Karnataka Style Chicken Curry
instructions: Marinate chicken with turmeric and salt for 30 minutes.
Heat oil, add onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add tomatoes and cook until mushy.
Add spice powders and cook until oil separates.
Add marinated chicken and cook covered until tender.
Garnish with curry leaves and serve hot.
